How can I modify this Latex code to generate a table with merged cells?
\begin{tabular}{|c|c|c|}
\hline
1 & 2 & 3 \\
\hline
4 & 5 & 6 \\
\hline
7 & 8 & 9 \\
\hline
\end{tabular}
I want to merge cells (1,1) and (2,1) and have the text "A" displayed in the merged cell. Similarly, I want to merge cells (3,1) and (3,2) and have the text "B" displayed in the merged cell. How can I achieve this using Latex?
